snippet: Officials said Thomas Yarnavick bludgeoned his roommate in an argument over their sectional curtain at a Rockaway Park nursing home.
abstract: Thomas Yarnavick, former resident of a nursing home in Rockaway Park, Queens, is sentenced to 17 years in prison after pleading guilty to bludgeoning his roommate, Jailall Singh, to death with metal footrest of a wheelchair in October 2013.
lead_paragraph: Officials said Thomas Yarnavick bludgeoned his roommate in an argument over their sectional curtain at a Rockaway Park nursing home.

headline.main: Man Sentenced to 17 Years for Beating Roommate to Death at Queens Nursing Home
headline.print_headline: 17-Year Term in Fatal Attack on Roommate

keywords.value: Beacon Rehabilitation and Nursing Center (Queens, NY)
